@media only screen and (min-width:768px){.image-gallery-npet:not(.image-gallery).add-image-shadow .owl-carousel .owl-stage-outer .owl-stage .owl-item picture{margin-right:20px}
}
@media only screen and (min-width:1200px){.image-gallery-npet:not(.image-gallery).add-image-shadow .owl-carousel .owl-stage-outer .owl-stage .owl-item picture{margin-right:10px}
}

}

}

}
